name: AI Extractability & Citation Readiness
scope_note: How AI systems summarize, extract, and cite content
purpose: Ensure content can be safely summarized, quoted, and reused by AI systems (search assistants, AI Overviews, copilots, voice answers) without distortion, misattribution, or loss of meaning.
principles: AI systems prefer content where search intent, definitions, and entity relationships are clear early.
Clear intent signalling improves extraction accuracy and citation confidence.

1_definition_first_clarity.description: Key concepts must be defined plainly and early in the content.
1_definition_first_clarity.example: Raccoon baby season is the spring period when female raccoons give birth and raise kits.

2_standalone_answer_blocks.description: Important answers must make sense when read out of context.
2_standalone_answer_blocks.example: A paragraph that can be quoted independently without surrounding explanation.
disallowed: Pronouns like “this”, “that”, “they”, or “it” without a clear antecedent
Answers that rely on earlier paragraphs for meaning

3_explicit_entity_naming.description: Always use consistent, explicit names for important entities.
3_explicit_entity_naming.example: Toronto homeowners instead of local residents.
disallowed: Using vague substitutes once an entity is defined

4_clear_entity_relationships.description: Explain how entities relate through cause, effect, dependency, or sequence.
4_clear_entity_relationships.example: Cold spring temperatures delay raccoon den movement, increasing attic occupancy.

5_low_ambiguity_language.description: Each sentence must have one clear interpretation.

6_structured_answer_patterns.description: Use formats AI systems can easily summarize and restate.
disallowed: Hiding instructions inside long narrative paragraphs

7_question_mirroring_headings.description: Headings should reflect real user questions.
7_question_mirroring_headings.example: What happens if raccoon babies are already born?

8_consistent_terminology.description: Once a term is defined, reuse it consistently throughout the content.
disallowed: Rotating synonyms for the same concept

9_balanced_non_promotional_tone.description: Explanatory content must remain neutral and factual.
disallowed: CTAs within instructional or factual sections

10_summarizable_conclusion.description: End with a clear, factual summary that AI systems can restate accurately.
